trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support for <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" />, <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart" />, and <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design para controles de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" />, <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart" /> e <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartDesigner> is a multi-purpose designer that provides design-time rendering for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> controls, which both inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> base class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartDesigner> é um designer multiuso que fornece o tempo de design de renderização para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> controles que herdam a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> classe base.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartDesigner> serves as a standard control designer, adding only what customization is needed to validate the associated control and apply its design mode state to the design-time rendering.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartDesigner> serve como um designer de controle padrão, adicionando apenas quais personalização é necessária para validar o controle associado e aplicar seu estado de modo de design para o processamento de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: If you have a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control, you can create a derived designer, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner>, to provide design-time rendering.
trans-unit.target: Se você tiver um personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> controle, você pode criar um designer derivado, como <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner>, para fornecer processamento em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: You can safely override any of the members as needed; however, when overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartDesigner.CreateViewControl%2A> method, be sure to call the base implementation to avoid losing design mode state information.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir qualquer um dos membros com segurança conforme o necessário; No entanto, ao substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartDesigner.CreateViewControl%2A> método, certifique-se de chamar a implementação base para evitar a perda de informações de estado de modo de design.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartDesigner> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner> share an identical interface and functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartDesigner> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner> compartilhar uma interface idêntico e funcionalidade.

trans-unit.source: For an applicable code example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de código aplicável, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> control to render at design time.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> associado a ser renderizado no tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> control.
This method is overridden to copy zone information to the view control.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é substituído para copiar informações de zona para o controle de exibição.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the control resides in a zone of type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" />, and then gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se o controle reside em uma zona do tipo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" /> e, em seguida, obtém a marcação que é usada para representar o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The markup that is used to represent the control at design time, or error markup if the control does not reside in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" />.
trans-unit.target: A marcação que é usada para representar o controle em tempo de design ou marcação de erro, se o controle não residir em um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" />-derived control associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: O controle derivado de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> associado ao designer.

trans-unit.source: Binds the designer to the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" />-derived control.
trans-unit.target: Associa o designer ao controle derivado de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart" /> associado.
